body:
Comment 4: 
@dominik.honnef: it's very difficult to create multiple CLs with changes
to the same file. either you create a series of CLs and mail one after
the previous one is submitted or you create a single CL with all changes.

Or, perhaps you can first propose to split the go-mode.el into several
independent files (i'm not sure if it's practical or even possible),
and then only propose CLs targeting different files at the same time.
